p:
For each of the five cities, we compiled the mean temperature (°C) and relative humidity (%) from TuTiempo ( https://en.tutiempo.net/), and calculated the mean absolute humidity (g m −3) for each 2-week period from 1985 to 2015. For each of the 26 2-week periods of the calendar year, we calculated 31-year mean temperature

and absolute humidity
